title: Google\Cloud\Recommender\V1\Insight
name: Insight
description:
An insight along with the information used to derive the insight. The insight may have associated recomendations as well.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.recommender.v1.Insight

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

methods.name: __construct
methods.description: Constructor.

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.name
params.description: Name of the insight.

params.name: data.description
params.description: Free-form human readable summary in English. The maximum length is 500 characters.

params.name: data.target_resources
params.description: Fully qualified resource names that this insight is targeting.

params.name: data.insight_subtype
params.description: Insight subtype. Insight content schema will be stable for a given subtype.

params.name: data.content
params.description: A struct of custom fields to explain the insight. Example: "grantedPermissionsCount": "1000"

params.name: data.last_refresh_time
params.description: Timestamp of the latest data used to generate the insight.

params.name: data.observation_period
params.description: Observation period that led to the insight. The source data used to generate the insight ends at last_refresh_time and begins at (last_refresh_time - observation_period).

params.name: data.state_info
params.description: Information state and metadata.

params.name: data.category
params.description: Category being targeted by the insight.

params.name: data.severity
params.description: Insight's severity.

params.name: data.etag
params.description: Fingerprint of the Insight. Provides optimistic locking when updating states.

params.name: data.associated_recommendations
params.description: Recommendations derived from this insight.
